thread.title: Ticket Liquidator: The Leading Affiliate Program in the Industry
thread.title_full: Ticket Liquidator: The Leading Affiliate Program in the Industry

title: Ticket Liquidator: The Leading Affiliate Program in the Industry
text:
October 08, 2015 09:34 ET Ticket Liquidator: The Leading Affiliate Program in the Industry 
SOUTH WINDSOR, CT--(Marketwired - Oct 8, 2015) - For over six years, the Ticket Liquidator Affiliate Program has linked internet marketers to one of the industry's leading online marketplaces for tickets to the best concert, sports, and theater events. Ticket Liquidator Affiliates are given the opportunity to earn commission by advertising inventory from one of the largest online ticket marketplaces, which offers tickets to over 75,000 events worldwide. 
TL Affiliates receive one of the most competitive commission rates in the ticketing industry, with access to a variety of tools to assist them in their marketing efforts. The program provides TL Affiliates with a number of materials, such as banners, text links, widgets, a data feed, and other tools to help direct customers to Ticket Liquidator's marketplace. Once a customer clicks an Affiliate's ad and makes a purchase on TicketLiquidator.com, the Affiliate earns a percentage of each sale that is referred for up to forty-five days. The Affiliate then receives payment for these sales each month on a rolling schedule with a number of payment options to choose from, including check, wire, or credit payments. 
In order to maintain a trusting relationship, the TL Affiliate Program operates on a number of tracking networks, each with its own unique user interface. From their accounts, Affiliates have access to all impression, click, and sales data, as well as other traffic metrics to analyze their marketing efforts. The TL Affiliate Program also provides additional industry resources to maximize Affiliate marketing strategy. This includes information on tour announcements, on sale dates, and top selling events, all of which are featured through the TL Affiliate Program's social media channels and monthly newsletters. The Affiliate support team is also available for any additional questions or requests. 
The Ticket Liquidator Affiliate Program is completely free to join. To get started, simply visit http://www.ticketliquidator.com/affiliateprogram.aspx and learn more about becoming a TL Affiliate today. 
Trademarked names are the property of their respective owners. Ticket Liquidator does not claim any right or ownership to any performer or venue name, or other trademark contained in this release. These names are strictly used for descriptive purposes and do not imply an endorsement or partnership. Ticket Liquidator is an online marketplace for tickets to live entertainment events. Since 2003, Ticket Liquidator has provided a selection of event seating inventory which now exceeds $1Billion. With 7-day Customer Service, PCI and SSL security certifications and a Worry-Free 125% Guarantee and Safety Net Program, Ticket Liquidator ensures that all purchases are made with confidence.
